data.text: @henrycooke Get well soon, enjoying your posts, good work fighting the good fight.
@henrycooke hope that you recover soon and fully.  sounds like you’re doing the best by yourself and your flat mates.
@henrycooke Good work Henry you are a GOOD flatmate
@henrycooke But are you using tin foil
@henrycooke good that you are feeling better.  Take extra days though .... a few have said they had 'relapse' 7-10 days post initial symptoms clearing.

@henrycooke Sounds like you’re doing everything right.
Btw I love your windows.
@henrycooke glad to see you're taking the opportunity to get that laundry done too. #practicalillness
